name: Bikefood Energy Powder Mix Orange or Mixed Berry
description:
The Bikefood Energy Drink Mix is prepared specifically for your sport and designed to provide your body with the ingredients it needs to perform at it's peak.

The Bikefood formula is science proven and gives you a number of real benefits which include a steady supply of energy, increased immune support, reduced cramps, increased motivation, increased performance, improved recovery and reduced muscle breakdown.

These multiple benefits are due to the innovative blend of energy sources including complex and simple carbohydrates, glutamine, Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs), electrolytes and vitamins.

In simple terms you'll perform better when out on your bike, and you'll recover faster and will be ready to ride again sooner.

name: Gymfood Chocolate Deluxe Protein
description:
Gymfood Dairy Free Protein Powder

Vegan friendly, dairy free protein powder, perfect for post exercise recovery.

• Use straight after traning for improved recovery 
• Drink on its own as a protein shake during the day 
• Rich in Omega 3, 6 & 9

NO gluten, wheat, soya, dairy, or added sugar.

Vegetarian and Vegan friendly.
